title: Iris - The Growing Breeze (Iris 1)
hero: Iris 1 Guide - Using Flame Spirit for leveling, which can transition to Thunder Spirit or Erosion Spirit later.

items.title: Act 1
items.content:
Level 3: equip elemental duo on Thunder Magus and then replace the other 2 skills with shadow dash

Level 4: equip a 3rd shadow dash, only dash when they're at 2 or more charges.

Level 7: replace Thunder magus with Flame magus + equip inc aoe 

When you get a pact slot, equip Greedy Chestnut - Lotus Root or Drapion Lady. This is much smoother for leveling because a lot of the XP you gain will be passive from the empower skill killing things, so CDR is arguably better here.

In the last trove of A1, equip Dazzling Bloom to help vs final boss of A1.

Talents: Min DMG, Cast speed, Crit area (3 pts), Enhanced skill (5 pts), Movement Speed (4 pts) -> can switch for Minion Level if need dmg.

Second Tree: Alchemist

items.title: Act 2
items.content:
Level 22: Elemental Fusion
Level 27: Mass Effect (dazzling bloom), control spell
Level 34: Magic Dash

Alchemist Talents: Min DMG, Cast Speed (2pts), Crit, Enhanced skill, Dmg + Level.

items.title: Act 3
items.content:
Level 50: Spell amplification, swiftness

Lich Talents: Min dmg, cast speed, crit, ALL STATS, Min DMG, CDR.
Last tree: Warlord for Fire Magus/Steel Vanguard Thunder Magus

sections.title: Early Maps (Thunder until Traveler t7 kill)

items.title: Legendary Gear Options
items.content:
Early Chest: Corrupted Bulwark (ES)/Martyr Staff (Life), Void Embankment? (DPS), Friend Nemesis (DPS)

Helmet: Fiend Crown

Amulet: False God's skin

Rings: Horn Ring, Windbreath Dispersion (REQUIRED)

Boots: Mind Infusion

items.title: Kismets
items.content:
Don't care about these early on.

Pactspirits: Anubis, Drapion, Vale
